document.full_text: israel launched air strikes in the gaza strip on monday, wounding at least 19 people, after militants fired mortar shells and rockets into the jewish state, witnesses and militant groups said.
document.title: israeli air strikes wound 19 in gaza strip
lines_and_colors: israel launched air strikes in the gaza strip on monday, wounding at least 19 people, after militants fired mortar shells and rockets into the jewish state, witnesses and militant groups said.
